channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Welcome to AI Week 2025】欢迎来到AI周2025周
item.description: 【 We’re seeing AI fundamentally change how people work across every industry. Customer support agents can respond to ten times the tickets. Software engineers are reviewers of AI generated code instead 】我们看到AI从根本上改变了人们在每个行业的工作方式。客户支持代理可以回应门票的十倍。软件工程师是AI生成的代码的审阅者

item.title: 【MoQ: Refactoring the Internet's real-time media stack】欧元：重构互联网的实时媒体堆栈
item.description: 【 Media over QUIC (MoQ) is a new IETF standard that resolves this conflict, creating a single foundation for sub-second, interactive streaming at a global scale. 】媒体上的QUIC（MOQ）是解决这一冲突的新型IETF标准，为全球范围内的秒，交互式流构成了一个基础。

item.title: 【Cloudflare incident on August 21, 2025】Cloudflare事件于2025年8月21日
item.description: 【 On August 21, 2025, an influx of traffic directed toward clients hosted in AWS us-east-1 caused severe congestion on links between Cloudflare and us-east-1. In this post, we explain the details. 】2025年8月21日，针对AWS US-EAST-1托管的客户的大量交通涌入，在Cloudflare和US-EAST-1之间的联系上造成了严重的交通拥堵。在这篇文章中，我们解释了细节。

item.title: 【How a volunteer-run wildfire site in Portugal stayed online during DDoS attacks】DDOS攻击期间，葡萄牙的志愿者经营的野火网站如何停留在线
item.description: 【 Fogos.pt, a volunteer-run wildfire tracker in Portugal, grew from a side project into a critical national resource used by citizens, media, and government. During 2025 fire season it was hit by DDoS 】Fogos.pt是葡萄牙的志愿者经营的野火追踪器，从附带项目发展成为公民，媒体和政府使用的关键国家资源。在2025年火灾季节，它被DDOS击中

item.title: 【How we built AI face cropping for Images】我们如何为图像建造AI面部裁剪
item.description: 【 AI face cropping for Images automatically crops around faces in an image. Here’s how we built this feature on Workers AI to scale for general availability. 】图像的AI面部裁剪会自动在图像中的面孔周围播种。这是我们在工人AI上构建此功能以扩展一般可用性的方式。

item.title: 【Announcing the Cloudflare Browser Developer Program】宣布CloudFlare浏览器开发人员计划
item.description: 【 Announcing the Browser Developer Program: Cloudflare’s new collaborative program to help shape Cloudflare challenges that work seamlessly with your browser. Join us today! 】宣布浏览器开发人员计划：CloudFlare的新协作计划，以帮助塑造与浏览器无缝搭配的Cloudflare挑战。立即加入我们！

item.title: 【MadeYouReset: An HTTP/2 vulnerability thwarted by Rapid Reset mitigations】MadyOureSet：http/2漏洞被快速复位缓解挫败
item.description: 【 A new HTTP/2 denial-of-service (DoS) vulnerability called MadeYouReset was recently disclosed by security researchers. Cloudflare HTTP DDoS mitigation, already protects from MadeYouReset. 】安全研究人员最近披露了一个新的HTTP/2拒绝服务（DOS）漏洞。 Cloudflare HTTP DDOS缓解措施，已经可以保护MadyYouReset。

item.title: 【Aligning our prices and packaging with the problems we help customers solve】使我们的价格和包装与我们帮助客户解决的问题保持一致
item.description: 【 You asked for simplicity. We listened. Introducing Externa and Interna, two new use-case-driven packages to simplify how you connect and protect your entire infrastructure. 】您要求简单。我们听了。介绍了两个新的用例驱动软件包Externa和Interna，以简化您如何连接和保护整个基础架构。

item.title: 【Redesigning Workers KV for increased availability and faster performance】重新设计工人KV，以提高可用性和更快的性能
item.description: 【 Workers KV is Cloudflare's global key-value store. After the incident on June 12, we re-architected KV’s redundant storage backend, remove single points of failure, and make substantial improvements. 】工人KV是Cloudflare的全球钥匙值商店。 6月12日事件发生后，我们重新建立了KV的冗余存储后端，删除单点失败并做出了重大改进。

item.title: 【Partnering with OpenAI to bring their new open models onto Cloudflare Workers AI】与Openai合作将他们的新开放模型带到Cloudflare工人AI
item.description: 【 OpenAI’s newest open-source models are now available on Cloudflare Workers AI on Day 0, with support for Responses API, Code Interpreter and Web Search (coming soon). 】OpenAI的最新开源型号现在可在CloudFlare工人AI上获得，并支持响应API，代码解释器和Web搜索（即将推出）。
